description:
Part of the Solution Foundation provides:
* Information and referral for housing for the homeless, disabled, and veteran populations. *Does not provide actual housing*
* Lightly used, in good conditions children's clothing, including school uniforms, donated by the community. 
* Accepts any clothing donations for children of all ages and adults.
* Assists the working poor with food.
name: PART OF THE SOLUTION FOUNDATION, INC.
